mapper.insert: insert into Synship.wms_bt_item_details ( order_channel_id, sku, product_id, itemcode, size, barcode, is_sale, client_sku, active, created, creater, modified, modifier ) VALUES ( #{order_channel_id}, #{sku}, #{product_id}, #{itemcode}, #{size}, #{barcode}, #{is_sale}, #{client_sku}, #{active}, #{created}, #{creater}, #{modified}, #{modifier} ) on duplicate key update itemcode = #{itemcode}, size = #{size}, barcode = #{barcode}, is_sale = #{is_sale}, client_sku = #{client_sku}, active = #{active}, created = #{created}, creater = #{creater}, modified = #{modified}, modifier = #{modifier}
